project.name: claude-remote
project.description: Web-based remote interface for Claude Code CLI, allowing mobile/browser access to Claude Code sessions

claude_integration.secondary: Claude Agent SDK V2 (no API key needed)
claude_integration.note: Both providers use Claude CLI OAuth auth

features.name: Remote Claude Access
features.description: Access Claude Code from any browser/mobile device

features.name: Session Management
features.description: List, switch, resume Claude sessions per project

features.name: Thinking Indicator
features.description: Show Claude extended thinking status with streaming content

features.name: Tool Use Display
features.description: Render tool calls and tool results in message stream

features.name: Provider Abstraction
features.description: Switch between CLI and SDK backends

features.name: iOS Mobile Support
features.description: Touch handlers, UUID fallback for older Safari

features.name: Message Copy (Mobile Support)
features.description: Copy message content to clipboard with HTTP fallback

features.name: Unified Command UI
features.description: Parse and display encoded command tags as clean UI blocks

features.name: WebSocket Room Isolation
features.description: Server supports Pub/Sub rooms but currently uses direct send() for simplicity

features.name: Tool Content Popup
features.description: Long tool use/result content is truncated, click to expand in fullscreen modal

features.name: AWF Content Filtering
features.description: Strip workflow content (YAML frontmatter, markdown body) from displayed messages

patterns.name: Provider Pattern
patterns.description: Abstraction layer for Claude integration (CLI vs SDK)

gotchas.issue: Copy to clipboard fails on mobile in LAN (HTTP)
gotchas.solution: Use legacy document.execCommand('copy') fallback for non-secure contexts

gotchas.issue: Stale closure in useCallback causes duplicate messages
gotchas.solution: Check for duplicate IDs in Zustand addMessage instead of relying on stale messages array

gotchas.issue: crypto.randomUUID not available on older iOS Safari
gotchas.solution: Fallback to custom UUID generator using Math.random

gotchas.issue: iOS Safari touch events need explicit handlers
gotchas.solution: Added onTouchEnd alongside onClick for send button

gotchas.issue: Enter key submits on mobile but prevents multiline input
gotchas.solution: Check window width to disable Enter submission on mobile

gotchas.issue: SDK V2 API uses unstable_ prefix
gotchas.solution: Use unstable_v2_createSession, unstable_v2_resumeSession - uses same OAuth as CLI

gotchas.issue: Claude folder naming converts slashes AND underscores to hyphens
gotchas.solution: Use regex /[\/_]/g to match both characters when transforming paths

gotchas.issue: sessions-index.json may reference deleted session files
gotchas.solution: Hybrid discovery: scan filesystem for .jsonl files + index, filter non-existent

gotchas.issue: ENOENT errors for missing session files are expected, not errors
gotchas.solution: Silent error handling with existsSync check before file operations

gotchas.issue: Streaming messages need both string and ContentBlock[] handling
gotchas.solution: updateMessage checks typeof and appends to text block or creates new one

gotchas.issue: Tool calls and thinking blocks not rendering from SDK stream
gotchas.solution: Added onThinkingContent handler and message:thinking_content WebSocket event

gotchas.issue: React StrictMode causes WebSocket disconnect on mount
gotchas.solution: Check both OPEN and CONNECTING states before reconnecting, don't close wsRef in cleanup

gotchas.issue: Stale closure in handleMessage callback prevents message send
gotchas.solution: Use useAppStore.getState().messages instead of closure-captured messages variable

gotchas.issue: tool_use blocks show empty input object
gotchas.solution: Parse toolInput from JSON string when creating/appending tool_use blocks

gotchas.issue: Session list not loading after project switch
gotchas.solution: Server auto-sends session:list event after project:switch is handled

gotchas.issue: Duplicate messages in UI from separate onChunk/onToolUse events
gotchas.solution: Unified CLI and SDK providers to use 'onMessage' snapshot strategy with 'message:append' event and 'upsertMessage' in store

gotchas.issue: AWF workflow content (## User Input, ## Goal) displayed in messages
gotchas.solution: Added regex patterns in stripSystemTags to detect @[/workflow] mentions and workflow headings, strip everything after

gotchas.issue: Empty message bubble after stripping workflow content
gotchas.solution: Check hasVisibleContent before rendering, return null if no text/tools/thinking/images

conventions.rule: All WebSocket events typed in shared/types.ts
conventions.reason: Type safety between client and server
Separation of concerns for Claude backends
Compatible with Claude Code CLI conventions

client/src/.components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input with slash command autocomplete

shared/.types.ts: Shared types for WebSocket events and domain models
